post:
I am sure there is something for everyone, if there is nothing you want... ask!

Payment methods: PayPal, Credit/Debit card (stripe), MANY crypto currencies through coingate.

NO Tor, No torrents, no open proxies, no cryto currency related activities (That includes wallets) 

All UK Plans are welcome to a free Direct Admin license on request and get DDOS protection at no extra cost.
